## Import Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(gghighlight)
library(ggridges)
library(tidytext)
library(scales)

sessionInfo()
```

### Import Data
```{r}
read_imdb <- function(data_path) {
  path <- "data/"
  read_tsv(paste0(path, data_path), na = "\\N", progress=F)
}

df_ratings <- read_imdb("title.ratings.tsv")
df_ratings %>% head()
```

### Create Plot
```{r}
plot <- ggplot(df_ratings, aes(x = numVotes, y = averageRating)) +
          geom_bin2d() +
          scale_x_log10(labels = comma) +
          scale_y_continuous(breaks = 0:10)

ggsave("output/plots/title-ratings.png", plot, width=4, height=3)
```
